verses.roman:
ei-mata piṭhā-pānā, kṣīra-odana
parama pavitra, āra kare sarvottama

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; piṭhā-pānā—cakes and sweet rice; kṣīra-odana—concentrated milk; parama pavitra—highly purified; āra—and; kare—he makes; sarva-uttama—first class, tasteful.
translation: "He prepared cakes, sweet rice, concentrated milk and everything else with great attention, and the cooking conditions were purified so that the food was first class and tasteful.
